Levels.description: For categorical variables: An object of possible values (keys) and their descriptions (values).
Levels.title: Levels

CollectionNeurobagel.description:
A Neurobagel annotation for a column that is part of a grouped collection of columns,
such as items from an instrument.

IsAbout.description: The concept or controlled term that describes this column

MissingValues.description: A list of unique values that represent invalid responses, typos, or missing data
MissingValues.title: Missingvalues

IsPartOf.description: If the column is a subscale or item of an assessment tool then the assessment tool should be specified here.

CollectionNeurobagel.title: CollectionNeurobagel

Column.description: The base model for a BIDS column description
Column.title: Column

ContinuousColumn.description: A BIDS column annotation for a continuous column

Units.description: Measurement units for the values in this column. SI units in CMIXF formatting are RECOMMENDED (see Units)
Units.title: Units

ContinuousNeurobagel.description: A Neurobagel annotation for a continuous column

IsAbout.description: The concept or controlled term that describes this column

MissingValues.description: A list of unique values that represent invalid responses, typos, or missing data
MissingValues.title: Missingvalues

Format.description: For continuous columns this field is used to describe the format of the raw numerical values in the column. This information is used to transform the column values into the desired format of the standardized data element referenced in the IsAbout attribute.

TermURL.description: An unambiguous identifier for the term, concept or entity that is referenced

Label.description: A human readable label. If more than one label exists for the term, then the preferred label should be used.
